    • Method Detail

      • on

        public void on(Class clazz,
               String message,
               Throwable thrown)
        Description copied from interface: ExceptionHandler
        A method to call when an exception occurs. It assumes there is a different handler for different levels.
        Specified by:
        on in interface ExceptionHandler
        Parameters:
        clazz - the error is associated with, e.g. the one in which it was caught
        message - any message associated with the error, or empty String.
        thrown - any Thorwable caught, or null if there was no exception.
